section.section: In Carroll County, the Board of License Commissioners may approve the issuance of a wine tasting (WT) alcoholic beverages license.
The license is issued only to holders of a beer, wine and liquor (BWL) or a beer and wine (BW) license.

The license permits the consumption of wine authorized to be sold by the beer, wine and liquor license (BWL) or the beer and wine license (BW) for tasting or sampling purposes only and for which no consideration may be charged or exacted.

The Board of License Commissioners shall regulate:
The quantity of wine to be served to each person; and
The number of bottles of wine from which this quantity is being served.

The annual license fee:
For holders of a BWL license, is $100 in addition to the cost of the BWL license; and
For holders of a BW license, is $100 in addition to the cost of the BW license.

text.section: The Carroll County Board of License Commissioners may adopt rules or regulations providing additional requirements to implement this section.
